00036 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 // This function return the vertex interpolated height.
00038 // Supplied by Praetor. Thanks a lot. ]:)
00039 void PagingLandScapeRaySceneQuery::execute(RaySceneQueryListener* listener) 
00040 { 
00041         ulong mask = getQueryMask();  
00042         ulong type_mask = getQueryTypeMask();     
00043     
00044     static WorldFragment worldFrag;
00045     worldFrag.fragmentType = SceneQuery::WFT_SINGLE_INTERSECTION;
00046 
00047     const Vector3& dir = mRay.getDirection();
00048     const Vector3& origin = mRay.getOrigin();
00049 
00050     bool noSpecializedQueries = true;
00051     bool noTerrainQuery = true;
00052 
00053     PagingLandScapeSceneManager* mSceneMgr = static_cast<PagingLandScapeSceneManager*>(mParentSceneMgr);
00054 
00055     // Exclusive Specialized Queries
00056     // Straight up / down?
00057     if ((mask & RSQ_Height) || 
00058                 (mask & RSQ_Height_no_interpolation) ||
00059         dir == Vector3::UNIT_Y || 
00060         dir == Vector3::NEGATIVE_UNIT_Y)
00061     {
00062         noTerrainQuery = false;
00063         //noSpecializedQueries = false;
00064 
00065         Real height;
00066         if (mask & RSQ_Height_no_interpolation)
00067             height = mSceneMgr->getData2DManager()->getWorldHeight(origin.x, origin.z);
00068         else
00069             height = mSceneMgr->getData2DManager()->getInterpolatedWorldHeight(origin.x, origin.z);
00070 
00071         worldFrag.singleIntersection.x = origin.x;
00072         worldFrag.singleIntersection.z = origin.z;
00073         worldFrag.singleIntersection.y = height;
00074         
00075         worldFrag.singleIntersection += mSceneMgr->getOptions()->position; //consider terrain offset
00076         
00077         //if (!listener->queryResult(&worldFrag,  (worldFrag.singleIntersection - origin).length()))                                    
00078         //if (!listener->queryResult(&worldFrag,  0))
00079                 //                      return;
00080         listener->queryResult(&worldFrag,  0);
00081     } 
00082     else if (mask & RSQ_FirstTerrain)
00083     {
00084         noTerrainQuery = false;
00085         //noSpecializedQueries = false;
00086 
00087         Real resFactor = 1.0f;
00088                 // Only bother if the non-default mask has been set
00089                 if((mask & RSQ_1xRes) == 0)
00090                 {
00091                         if(mask & RSQ_2xRes)
00092             {
00093                                 resFactor = 0.5f;
00094                         } 
00095             else if(mask & RSQ_4xRes) 
00096             {
00097                                 resFactor = 0.25f;
00098                         } 
00099                         //if(mask & RSQ_8xRes) 
00100             //{
00101                         //      resFactor = 0.125f;
00102                         //}
00103                 }
00104         if (mSceneMgr->intersectSegmentTerrain(
00105                         origin, dir*resFactor, 
00106                         &worldFrag.singleIntersection))
00107         {
00108             //if (!listener->queryResult(&worldFrag,  (worldFrag.singleIntersection - origin).length()))                                        
00109             //if (!listener->queryResult(&worldFrag,  0))
00110                         //                  return;
00111             listener->queryResult(&worldFrag,  0);
00112         }
00113     }  
00114     else if (mask & RSQ_AllTerrain)
00115         {
00116         noTerrainQuery = false;
00117         //noSpecializedQueries = false;
00118 
00119         Real resFactor = 1.0f;
00120                 // Only bother if the non-default mask has been set
00121                 if((mask & RSQ_1xRes) == 0)
00122                 {
00123                         if(mask & RSQ_2xRes)
00124             {
00125                                 resFactor = 0.5f;
00126                         } 
00127             else if(mask & RSQ_4xRes) 
00128             {
00129                                 resFactor = 0.25f;
00130                         } 
00131             //else if(mask & RSQ_8xRes) 
00132             //{
00133                         //      resFactor = 0.125f;
00134                         //}
00135                 }
00136 
00137 
00138         const Vector3 raydir (mRay.getDirection());
00139         const Vector3 raymove (raydir * resFactor);
00140         const Real distmove = 1 * resFactor;
00141         const Real maxHeight = mSceneMgr->getData2DManager()->getMaxHeight ();
00142         const Real MaxTerrainX = mSceneMgr->getOptions()->maxScaledX;
00143         const Real MaxTerrainZ = mSceneMgr->getOptions()->maxScaledZ;
00144 
00145         Vector3 ray (mRay.getOrigin());
00146             Real dist = 0.0f;
00147 
00148         // while ray is inside or ray is outside but raydir going inside
00149         while ((ray.y < 0 && raydir.y > 0) || 
00150                 (ray.y > maxHeight    && raydir.y < 0) || 
00151                 (ray.x < -MaxTerrainX && raydir.x > 0) || 
00152                 (ray.x > MaxTerrainX  && raydir.x < 0) || 
00153                 (ray.z < -MaxTerrainZ && raydir.z > 0) || 
00154                 (ray.z > MaxTerrainZ  && raydir.z < 0)) 
00155                 {
00156                         ray += raymove;
00157                         dist += distmove;
00158             if (ray.y < maxHeight)// no need to do complex tests
00159             {
00160                 const Vector3 land (getHeightAt(ray));
00161                 if (ray.y < land.y)
00162                 {
00163                     WorldFragment* frag = new WorldFragment();
00164                     //fragmentList.push_back(frag);
00165 
00166                     frag->fragmentType = SceneQuery::WFT_SINGLE_INTERSECTION; 
00167                     frag->singleIntersection = land;
00168                                         
00169                     if (!listener->queryResult(frag,  dist))
00170                                             break;
00171                 }
00172             }
00173         } 
00174     }
00175 
00176     // Could want entities and terrain or or just entities, or didn't say nothing...
00177     if(mask & RSQ_Entities)
00178     {
00179         noSpecializedQueries = false;
00180         // Check for entity contacts
00181         PagingLandScapeOctreeRaySceneQuery::execute(listener);
00182     }
00183 
00184     if (noSpecializedQueries)
00185     {
00186         /*
00187         if (noTerrainQuery)
00188         {
00189             setQueryMask(mask | RSQ_AllTerrain | RSQ_Entities);
00190             // Check for terrain contacts
00191             PagingLandScapeRaySceneQuery::execute(listener);
00192             setQueryMask(mask);
00193         }
00194         */
00195         // Check for entity contacts
00196         PagingLandScapeOctreeRaySceneQuery::execute(listener);
00197     }
00198 } 
00199 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00200 Vector3 PagingLandScapeRaySceneQuery::getHeightAt(const Vector3& origin) const
00201 {
00202 
00203     PagingLandScapeSceneManager * mSceneMgr = static_cast<PagingLandScapeSceneManager*>(mParentSceneMgr);
00204         return Vector3(origin.x, mSceneMgr->getData2DManager()->getInterpolatedWorldHeight(origin.x, origin.z), origin.z);
00205 
00206 }
00207 
00208 } // namespace Ogre
